description.narrative: The National System of Comprehensive Attention and Reparation of Victims and the National Family Welfare System have increased their capacities to adopt and implement specific mechanisms and programmes on DDR as well as mine action standards, targeting girls, boys, and adolescents affected by the armed conflict., which contributes to Child Protection And Emergencies, Harmful Practices (Fgm/C And Child Marriage), Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children (Covid), Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Staff costs

sector.narrative: Children associated with armed forces and armed groups - prevention and response
Landmines and explosive weapons - prevention and assistance
MRM - Child protection monitoring and reporting of grave violations in armed conflict (Security Council Resolutions 1612, 1882, 1888 and 1960)

title.narrative: Colombia United Nations Development Assistance Framework
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
"2019 Colombia: Evaluación de resultados de las acciones de inclusión de familias con niñas niños y adolescentes con discapacidad en Familias en Acción (2012-2018)"
Colombia 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: The National System of Comprehensive Attention and Reparation of Victims and the National Family Welfare System have increased their capacities to adopt and implement specific mechanisms and programmes on DDR as well as mine action standards, targeting girls, boys, and adolescents affected by the armed conflict.

description.narrative: UNICEF Colombia consolidated its work to guarantee the sustainability of actions with entities of the National System of Comprehensive Attention and Reparation of Victims to support the reintegration of FARC-EP disengaged children and to provide assistance to mine victims. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/01/2020

title.narrative: (NOT VALID after Dec 31 2017) ) UNICEF-targeted children in humanitarian situations benefitting from psychosocial support
Percentage of new civil victims of LM / UXO / IED who know their rights and the route to access comprehensive assistance services
Existence of a contingency plan for massive separation of children and teenagers from illegal armed groups validated by the National Family Welfare System

target.value: 2020:A reintegration strategy with a youth-approach prepared

actual.value: 2020:ICBF has a specialized programme for demobilized children which includes a contingency plan.
